meta.title: We are SMS specialists of over 10 years | ThaiBulkSMS
meta.description: Thailand’s Number 1 SMS message transmission service is confident that you will receive the best. You will also be able to send messages on your own without the need to go through middle parties.

HeroSection.Why should I use the SMS messaging servi: Why should I use the SMS messaging service of ThaiBulkSMS?

SmsSection.As Thailand’s Number 1 SMS Communication: As Thailand’s Number 1 SMS Communication Platform, which can be personally confirmed,
SmsSection.ThaiBulkSMS provides the SMS Communicati: ThaiBulkSMS provides the SMS Communication Platform that is certified by the National Broadcasting and Telecommunications Commission. We have been operating for over 10 years, so you can certainly rest assured in the quality of our service.

BrandSection.Quick sending, rapid receipt, and confid: Quick sending, rapid receipt, and confidently stable transmissions using Intelligent Routing
BrandSection.3 direct networks can be used for sendin: 3 direct networks can be used for sending
BrandSection.Messaging therefore proceeds quickly and: Messaging therefore proceeds quickly and with high stability. No bottlenecks occur because we have many channels available for transmission.
BrandSection.Selecting a transmission channel that co: Selecting a transmission channel that corresponds with the network of the recipient number
BrandSection.We have a network inspection system for: We have a network inspection system for the number of the recipient, which filters SMS messages to be sent directly through that network, allowing quicker messaging.
BrandSection.Automatic selection of the best channel: Automatic selection of the best channel
BrandSection.If any channel experiences problems, the: If any channel experiences problems, the system is able to immediately shift messaging to other channels, in addition to having backup transmission systems.

PriceSection.Focus on cheap prices or on full feature: Focus on cheap prices or on full features can be selected according to your needs
PriceSection.The best SMS price is available at only: The best SMS price is available at only
PriceSection.All the features of Standard SMS: All the features of Standard SMS
PriceSection.OTP messaging with a Ready-to-use system: OTP messaging with a Ready-to-use system
PriceSection.Credit refunds if recipients are unable: Credit refunds if recipients are unable to receive the messages

TrackSection.Easily operated, no matter what category: Easily operated, no matter what category of User you are.
TrackSection.<span>For new users</span> who have yet: For new users who have yet to send SMS messages through the web.
TrackSection.Sending SMS messages through ThaiBulkSMS: Sending SMS messages through ThaiBulkSMS is free from complications and does not require technical knowledge. If you are stuck with problems, there are many channels that are ready to assist.
TrackSection.<span>For Marketers</span> who wish to a: For Marketers who wish to analyze the effects of their SMS campaigns
TrackSection.Results analysis tools and easily unders: Results analysis tools and easily understandable reports are available, leading to future analyses on whether the campaign was successful.
TrackSection.<span>For Developers</span> who write pr: For Developers who write programs that link with APIs
TrackSection.Easy to code programs that link with API: Easy to code programs that link with APIs; a variety of languages are supported, and a system that supports OTP sending is included.
TrackSection.Included with support from a team of spe: Included with support from a team of specialists
TrackSection.This creates confidence that if the syst: This creates confidence that if the system experiences problems, we can immediately fix the situation for you, regardless of whether it is a Hardware or Software issue.
TrackSection.Safely preserve your data with Internet: Safely preserve your data with Internet Banking standards.
TrackSection.With an SSL security system that has the: With an SSL security system that has the highest standards used in various Internet Banking platforms, you can rest assured that your use of ThaiBulkSMS will receive the same level of safety as that of Internet Banking.

Increase successes with SMS Marketing
through Thailand’s number 1 SMS Provider.
